isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-8609 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - SYNCHRONIZER ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Place the larger LO range synchronizer ring face down on a bench with pins up. Install the sliding clutch, recessed side up, on blocker pins of the LO range synchronizer ( Figure 131).

figure.caption: Figure 131. Install Sliding Clutch on Blocker Pins of LO Range Synchronizer

note.para: Pins on the LO Range synchronizer must line up with the chamfered holes on the bottom of the sliding clutch.

step1.para: Install the three springs in the bores of the HI range synchronizer ring ( Figure 132).

figure.caption: Figure 132. Install Springs in Bores of HI Range Synchronizer Ring

step1.para: Place the HI range synchronizer ring over the blocker pins of the LO speed synchronizer ring, seating the springs against the pins ( Figure 133).

figure.caption: Figure 133. Place HI Range Synchronizer Ring Over Blocker Pins of LO Speed Synchronizer Ring

step1.para: Apply downward pressure to the HI range synchronizer ring WHILE TWISTING COUNTERCLOCKWISE to compress the springs and fully seat the ring on the blocker pins of the LO range synchronizer ( Figure 134). It is suggested that a shop towel be placed over the synchronizer to prevent injury to your hands.

figure.caption: Figure 134. Apply Downward Pressure to HI Range Synchronizer Ring
